name: Path Of Destruction
description:
Get out of your base, get out of the comfort zone.


Face other opponents inside a unknow labyrinth. Follow the path to nowhere or destroy the walls to give a end for your enemies. Path of Destruction is a round based game, every round you have a opportunity to purchase and sell items before going to the action. Move around gathering items, exploding dynamites, throwing grenades or just shot at the wall, the rule is never stand in the same place.


Adquire powerful weapons and bring destruction to the game.


We have a few available weapons now:
- Glock (Pistol) | Ak47 (Rifle) | M4A1 (Rifle) | MP249 (Heavy Machine Gun) | Katana (Melee) | Baseball Bet (Melee)


Create new strategies to get ahead of your enemies


Use your resource wisely, don't open a new passage on the labyrinth with explosives if it doesn't lead to new items/resources.
Find out combinations of specials (those can be purchased on the shop), you could leave specific items on the map and place mines near it so other players may will fall down.


Face not only players but also other environment enemies.


There are two times of AI enemies:
- Walking [Blue Aliens] | Static [Turrets]


Troll your friends with fake items special.


You can have 3 different specials at the same time, each special can be used two times (once an upgrade is bought). There are a few types of specials in the game right now:
- Back To Base | Fake Item | Cluster Bomb | Pain Reflection | Master Key | Ghost | Invisible Bullets | Remote Controlled Bomb | First Aid Kit | Projectiles Ignore Walls | Missile Attack | Brightness | Bomber
